definitions.definition: One who benefits or receives an advantage.
definitions.example: You are the lucky beneficiary of this special offer.

definitions.definition: One who benefits from the distribution, especially of an estate.
definitions.example: If any beneficiary does not survive the Settlor for a period of 30 days then the Trustee shall distribute that beneficiary’s share to the surviving beneficiaries by right of representation.

definitions.definition: One who benefits from the payout of an insurance policy.
Holding some office or valuable possession, in subordination to another; holding under a feudal or other superior; having a dependent and secondary possession.
